00044       : start(start_row), start_inclusive(start_row_inclusive),
00045         end(end_row), end_inclusive(end_row_inclusive) { }

00047       decode(bufp, remainp);
00048     }

00095   class ScanSpec {
00096   public:

00098         time_interval(TIMESTAMP_MIN, TIMESTAMP_MAX), return_deletes(false) { }
00099     ScanSpec(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) { decode(bufp, remainp); }
00100 
00101     size_t encoded_length() const;
00102     void encode(uint8_t **bufp) const;
00103     void decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp);

00105     void clear() {
00106       row_limit = 0;
00107       max_versions = 0;
00108       columns.clear();
00109       row_intervals.clear();
00110       cell_intervals.clear();
00111       time_interval.first = TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00112       time_interval.second = TIMESTAMP_MAX;
00113       return_deletes = 0;
00114     }
00115 
00117     void base_copy(ScanSpec &other) const {
00118       other.row_limit = row_limit;
00119       other.max_versions = max_versions;
00120       other.columns = columns;
00121       other.time_interval = time_interval;
00122       other.return_deletes = return_deletes;
00123       other.row_intervals.clear();
00124       other.cell_intervals.clear();
00125     }

00127     void swap(ScanSpec &ss) {
00128       std::swap(row_limit, ss.row_limit);
00129       std::swap(max_versions, ss.max_versions);
00130       row_intervals.swap(ss.row_intervals);
00131       cell_intervals.swap(ss.cell_intervals);
00132       std::swap(time_interval, ss.time_interval);
00133       std::swap(return_deletes, ss.return_deletes);
00134     }

00137     uint32_t max_versions;

00149   class ScanSpecBuilder : boost::noncopyable {
00150   public:
00151     ScanSpecBuilder() { }
00153     ScanSpecBuilder(const ScanSpec &);
00154 
00160     void set_row_limit(int32_t n) { m_scan_spec.row_limit = n; }
00161 
00167     void set_max_versions(uint32_t n) { m_scan_spec.max_versions = n; }
00168 
00174     void add_column(const char *str) {
00175       m_scan_spec.columns.push_back(m_alloc.dup(str));
00176     }
00177 
00183     void add_row(const char *str) {
00184       if (m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.size())
00185         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "cell spec excludes rows");
00186       RowInterval ri;
00187       ri.start = ri.end = m_alloc.dup(str);
00188       ri.start_inclusive = ri.end_inclusive = true;
00189       m_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00190     }
00191 
00200     void add_row_interval(const char *start, bool start_inclusive,
00201                           const char *end, bool end_inclusive) {
00202       if (m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.size())
00203         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "cell spec excludes rows");
00204       RowInterval ri;
00205       ri.start = m_alloc.dup(start);
00206       ri.start_inclusive = start_inclusive;
00207       ri.end = m_alloc.dup(end);
00208       ri.end_inclusive = end_inclusive;
00209       m_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00210     }
00211 
00218     void add_cell(const char *row, const char *column) {
00219       if (m_scan_spec.row_intervals.size())
00220         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "row spec excludes cells");
00221       CellInterval ci;
00222       ci.start_row = ci.end_row = m_alloc.dup(row);
00223       ci.start_column = ci.end_column = m_alloc.dup(column);
00224       ci.start_inclusive = ci.end_inclusive = true;
00225       m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00226     }
00227 
00240     void add_cell_interval(const char *start_row, const char *start_column,
00241                            bool start_inclusive, const char *end_row,
00242                            const char *end_column, bool end_inclusive) {
00243       if (m_scan_spec.row_intervals.size())
00244         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCAN_SPEC, "row spec excludes cells");
00245       CellInterval ci;
00246       ci.start_row = m_alloc.dup(start_row);
00247       ci.start_column = m_alloc.dup(start_column);
00248       ci.start_inclusive = start_inclusive;
00249       ci.end_row = m_alloc.dup(end_row);
00250       ci.end_column = m_alloc.dup(end_column);
00251       ci.end_inclusive = end_inclusive;
00252       m_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00253     }

00262     void set_time_interval(int64_t start, int64_t end) {
00263       m_scan_spec.time_interval.first = start;
00264       m_scan_spec.time_interval.second = end;
